Generation VIII.Sword: When it isn't battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles .
Generation VIII.Shield: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult's horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Dragapult can make its whole body transparent by clearing its mind and focusing. Even the Dreepy in Dragapult’s horns become invisible.
Generation IX.Violet: The fastest Dragapult of the group is always surrounded by Dreepy that want to fly at sonic speed.

Generation VIII.Sword: Axew's Eye , Rolling Fields ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Axew's Eye , Rolling Fields ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Old Cemetery , Three-Point Pass ( Wanderer ) Slippery Slope , Old Cemetery , Giant's Foot , Frigid Sea , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )
